Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

JobService.description: The JobService schema contains properties for scheduling and execution of operations, represents the properties for the job service itself, and has links to jobs managed by the job service.
JobService.longDescription: This resource shall represent a job service for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

DateTime.description: The current date and time setting for the job service.
DateTime.longDescription: This property shall contain the current date and time setting for the job service.

Jobs.description: The links to the jobs collection.
Jobs.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type JobCollection.

Log.description: The link to a log service that the job service uses.  This service can be a dedicated log service or a pointer a log service under another resource, such as a manager.
Log.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type LogService that this job service uses.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

ServiceCapabilities.description: The supported capabilities of this job service implementation.
ServiceCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe the capabilities or supported features of this implementation of a job service.

ServiceEnabled.description: An indication of whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether this service is enabled.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

JobServiceCapabilities.description: The supported capabilities of this job service implementation.
JobServiceCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe the capabilities or supported features of this implementation of a job service.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs supported.
MaxJobs.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of jobs supported by the implementation.

MaxSteps.description: The maximum number of job steps supported.
MaxSteps.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum number of steps supported by a single job instance.

Scheduling.description: An indication of whether scheduling of jobs is supported.
Scheduling.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the Schedule property within the job supports scheduling of jobs.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #JobService.v1_0_4.JobService
